name: Standard Medkit
description: Military-surplus medical kit. Includes synth-skin patches, coagulant gel, and a pre-loaded auto-injector. Expired three years ago, but probably still works. Probably.

usage.use_text: You crack open the medkit and apply the synth-skin patches. The coagulant gel stings as it seals the wounds. Not pretty, but effective.

lore.flavor_text: Standard issue for corpo-soldiers. The expiration date is more of a suggestion than a rule.
